peripheralPage.name: _instance

intOption.name: NumChannels
intOption.toolTip: The number of timer channels available

intOption.name: NumChannelVectors
intOption.toolTip: Number of channel event interrupt vectors - \n Multiple Channels may be mapped to the same vector

peripheralPage.template:
\t//! Number of channels implemented \tstatic constexpr unsigned NumChannels = $(NumChannels);
\t//! Number of channel event vectors implemented \tstatic constexpr unsigned NumChannelVectors = $(NumChannelVectors);\n\n

intOption.name: minimumInterval
intOption.toolTip: This value is used as a minimum acceptable value for the timer interval in ticks\n when using convertMicrosecondsToTicks() or convertSecondsToTicks()

intOption.name: minimumResolution
intOption.toolTip: This value is used as a minimum value for the timer period in ticks \n so that a reasonable resolution is available for PWM duty-cycle

intOption.name: ftmExternalClock
intOption.toolTip: Clock frequency of external clock supplied to FTM_CLKIN pin

choiceOption.name: ftm_sc_clks
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the clock source for the module

choiceOption.name: ftm_sc_ps
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the prescaler for the module

floatOption.name: clockFrequency
floatOption.toolTip: Determined from timer clock source and prescaler

floatOption.name: clockPeriod
floatOption.toolTip: Determined from timer clock source and prescaler

binaryOption.name: ftm_sc_cpwms
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects CPWM mode\n This mode configures the FTM to operate in Up-Down Counting mode.

bitmaskOption.name: ftm_exttrig_trig
bitmaskOption.toolTip: Enables the generation of the trigger when the FTM counter \n is equal to the channel CnV register.

binaryOption.name: ftm_exttrig_inittrigen
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the generation of the trigger when the FTM counter \n is equal to the CNTIN register.

peripheralPage.template: \t//! Default value for EXTTRIG) register \tstatic constexpr uint32_t exttrig = \t $(ftm_exttrig_trig)| // External Trigger Enable \t FTM_EXTTRIG_INITTRIGEN($(ftm_exttrig_inittrigen)); // Initialisation Trigger Enable \n\n

irqOption.name: irqHandlingMethod
irqOption.toolTip: This selection allow the interrupt handler for this peripheral to be installed using several different methods

irqOption.name: faultIrqHandlingMethod
irqOption.toolTip: This selection allow the interrupt handler for this peripheral to be installed using several different methods

irqOption.name: overflowIrqHandlingMethod
irqOption.toolTip: This selection allow the interrupt handler for this peripheral to be installed using several different methods

peripheralPage.template: \t//! Class based callback handler has been installed in vector table \tstatic constexpr bool irqHandlerInstalled = ($(irqHandlingMethod) == 1);\n\n

intOption.name: irqLevel
intOption.toolTip: Sets the priority level used to configure the NVIC Lower numbers represent higher priorities

peripheralPage.template:
